about.title: About hromada
about.mission: hromada, "community" in Ukrainian, connects municipalities with donors to rebuild critical infrastructure, focusing on renewable energy and sustainability.
about.statementOfPurposeText: This platform serves as a transparent bridge between Ukrainian municipalities seeking support for renewable energy and infrastructure projects, and donors who want to make a direct, meaningful impact. Our goal is to restore the flow of support for the sustainable reconstruction of Ukrainian infrastructure in the wake of the cessation of aid by the United States government. The ultimate purpose is the decentralization of Ukraine's power grids and the building of sustainable resilience against Russian attacks on critical infrastructure.
about.howItWorksText: We work with trusted NGO partners on the ground in Ukraine to identify and verify infrastructure projects that need funding. These partners help ensure each project is legitimate and impactful.
about.forPartnersText: Our partner organizations submit verified projects from municipalities they work with. Each project goes through a verification process before being published.
about.forDonorsText: Browse verified projects, filter by category, urgency, or location, and connect directly with communities to provide support.
about.directConnectionText: We process donations and transfer funds directly to the recipient municipality. You always know exactly which project your contribution supports.
about.categoryIntro: We fund solar PVs, battery storage, heat pumps, and thermo-modernization for:
about.civilianOnly: All projects are strictly civilian infrastructure. We do not fund military or dual-use equipment.
about.contactText: Questions or feedback? Reach out to us at
about.ourPartnersText: We work with trusted NGO partners on the ground in Ukraine who help verify projects and facilitate connections.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.intro: We take trust seriously. Every project on hromada goes through a verification process to ensure authenticity and protect both donors and municipalities.
transparency.civilianOnlyText: hromada exclusively funds civilian infrastructure projects—hospitals, schools, water utilities, and renewable energy systems. We do not fund, facilitate, or support any military equipment, dual-use technology, or defense-related projects. Our mission is humanitarian: helping Ukrainian communities maintain essential services and build sustainable energy independence.
transparency.verificationText: Each project submission is reviewed by our team before being published. We verify the municipality's identity, confirm the project details, and ensure the information is accurate.
transparency.directConnectionText: We process donations and transfer funds directly to the recipient municipality. Full transparency means you always know exactly which project and community your contribution supports.
transparency.partnersText: We work with trusted NGOs and organizations on the ground in Ukraine who help verify projects and facilitate connections between donors and communities.
transparency.processStep1Text: Municipality or NGO partner submits project
transparency.processStep2Text: Our team reviews and verifies details
transparency.processStep3Text: Approved projects go live on platform
transparency.faq1Answer: 100% of your donation goes directly to the municipality for the specified project. hromada does not take any transaction fees or overhead from donations. We are funded separately through grants and institutional support.
transparency.faq2Question: How do I know projects are real?
transparency.faq2Answer: Every project goes through a multi-step verification process. We work with trusted NGO partners on the ground in Ukraine who help verify municipality identities, project details, and needs. We also review documentation and conduct due diligence before publishing any project.
transparency.faq3Question: Can I visit or see updates on my funded project?
transparency.faq3Answer: Yes! After funding is complete, municipalities provide updates and photos of project implementation. For larger donations, we can arrange virtual meetings with the municipality or, when safe, coordinate site visits.
transparency.faq4Answer: Ukraine's energy infrastructure has been systematically targeted. By focusing on solar, battery storage, and heat pumps, we help communities build decentralized, resilient energy systems that can't be taken out by a single attack. This creates long-term energy independence.
transparency.faq5Answer: hromada operates through grants and institutional support from foundations committed to Ukrainian recovery. This allows us to pass 100% of individual donations directly to projects without administrative fees.
